flawed_nl_solution:
We have to know how many MB are 360GB, 360GB x 1000MB/1GB = <<3600000=3600000>>3600000 MB
The total seconds downloading will be 3600000MB / 50MB/second = <<3600000/50=72000>>72000 seconds
So she has to wait 72000 seconds / 3600 seconds/1 hour = <<72000/3600=20>>20 hours
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 360000, not 3600000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
